name: Houston Art & Museum Events
description:
#3 ARTS & CULTURE MEETUP GROUP WORLDWIDE

#4 ARTS & ENTERTAINMENT MEETUP GROUP WORLDWIDE

* * * * * * *

* * * * * * *

Our social group is for people who wish to experience the art and culture that Houston provides.  We enjoy an art-related group event several times a month. We participate in a variety of activities from attending art festivals to viewing museum exhibits.

Every event will have specific details.  Event descriptions will provide all necessary information such as the meet and greet location as well as any ticket price if applicable.

Please contact the Organizer with any questions.

* * * * * * *

“To practice any art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow. So do it.”
― Kurt Vonnegut, A Man Without a Country

name: Houston Denver Broncos Fans Meetup Group
description:
This group is for like minded die-hard Denver Broncos Fans living, breathing, working, or visiting in the Houston Metro area.

The purpose of this group is to create an active social network of Broncos fans for watching party meetups, experiencing the thrill and excitement of a Broncos victory, while celebrating the agony of defeat of the opposing team, with plenty of trash talk in between.

Details on meetup events are announced as they are scheduled and may included a change in venue location from week to week during the season and as event logistics are considered.

You can also join us on Facebook under groups:

"Houston's Denver Broncos Fans"

You can follow us on Twitter @BroncosFansHou

name: Diabetes Free Houston 2017 Meetup
description: There is a lot of info out there about managing and reversing diabetes without drugs but it's NOT WORKING! The numbers of people with diabetes is GROWING EACH DAY. Something has to be done! So we're doing it! We're starting in our area and we need caring, loving, like minded people to join us in this movement to REALLY CREATE CHANGE. Please share this with those you know with diabetes, their families and others you think would like join forces and make a positive difference in our future.

name: Houston Big Data Science
description: This meetup is about sharing knowledge & learning the latest developments about statistics, machine learning, math, analytics, parallel algorithms, distributed systems.

name: NetSquared Houston
description: Social changemakers and technological forerunners come together at Net Tuesday events to mix, swap stories and ideas, build new relationships, and reinforce the online NetSquared (http://www.netsquared.org) community.

name: Houston 20's Christian Friends
description:
You should join this group if:
-You want to hang out with wholesome friends (even if you are not a Christian)
-You're looking for a fun group who doesn't get swhasted all day everyday
-There are restaurants, movies, board games and more that you want to try/see but don't know anyone in Houston
-You're in your 20's and are looking for new friends who are also in their 20's
-You're alive (so now you HAVE to join this group) 


In all realness if you want to meet cool, hip, groovy kids your age you should join! Maybe you feel lonely, you're new to the city or at a point in life where you want a fresh start and to meet new people. Whatever the case is, if you are looking for QUALITY friends, join us!

Please contact me with any meet up ideas!

name: Woodlands Technical Writers Guild
description: The Woodlands Technical Writers Guild is for anyone interested in technical writing, close reading, scientific expression, data visualization and statistical analysis. We will constantly develop our supportive, trusted critique environment as a safe place to relate to one another as professionals. The aim is to be able to discuss each other’s writing but not feel threatened on any level. The purpose of the WTWG is to push our technical skills toward the maximum by the magical phenomenon of strength in numbers.

name: Houston Texans Fans Meetup Group
description:
This group is for like minded die-hard Houston Texans Fans living, breathing, working, or visiting in the Houston Metro area or anywhere else in the USA. Texans Fans from right here at home in Houston, Texas or abroad are ALWAYS welcome!

The purpose of this group is to create an active social network of Houston Texans Fans for game watching party meetups at select local establishments whether playing at home or away, experiencing the thrill and excitement of a Texans victory, while celebrating the agony of defeat for the opposing team, with plenty of trash talk in between! There's watching a game and there's watching a game with your fellow Texans Fans!

Make sure you follow us on our Meetup.Com page, as our game viewing locations may change from week to week, based on availability and logistics.

If you plan on attending one of our meetups, please be sure to RSVP to be included and eligible for some of the perks and giveaways. This will help us adequately plan for the event.  GO TEXANS!!!!

name: Network After Work - Houston Networking Events
description:
Network After Work is America’s premier face-to-face business networking company with monthly mixer events in over 60 cities catering to nearly one million members. 

Attendees make valuable connections with other members of their business community while enjoying different exciting venues including clubs, restaurants, hotels, and special event locations. Network After Work launched in 2009 and has become the largest and fastest growing organization of its kind. 

Each event attracts a diverse mix of up to several hundred professionals from all industries and career levels. It all takes place on a weekday right after work in a fun and relaxed atmosphere conducive to making connections.

Visit us at:

http://houston.networkafterwork.com

name: Houston Data Visualization Meetup
description: This group is a place to share experiences with data visualization. Come talk about the software tools you use and the interactive graphics that inspire you.

name: Houston MBA Network
description:
Houston-area group for MBA graduates.
When we graduate from the program, the classes come to an end... but the learning never stops. The goal of this group is to be a forum for that learning (and holding each other accountable)...

Activities may include getting together for discussing new industry trends, case discussions and for general networking. Join the group and share your ideas!

name: The Houston Couples Social Meetup
description:
Meet, socialize, laugh, and make friends with other couples in Houston!

Are you:
- Bored with your same weekend routine
- Bored with hanging with the same people
- Bored with the same hang outs
- Bored with staying at home on weekends
- New to town

We are fun & lively COUPLES who meetup to socialize & explore Greater Houston and beyond together. Our events are dining out, movies, dancing, listening to live music, sporting events, pubs, events/festivals, playing cards/boards games, wine & beer tastings, outdoor activities....
THE FUN AND POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS TO WHAT WE CAN PLAN!

We meet all around the greater Houston area, including The Galleria, Downtown/Midtown, West Houston, The Woodlands/Spring, Tomball, Katy/Cypress, Kemah/Galveston, Pearland, Sugar Land areas etc.

We have on average one event or more a month on our calendar, typically on a weekend or Friday night.

Whether you're new to the area or longtime Houstonians, we invite you to make new friends and GET OUT OF THE HOUSE!  Our couples include those that are married as well as those that are dating, ranging in age from early 20's to retirees, of all races and cultures, some with children and some without.  We don't discriminate--we are truly a fun, diverse group of couples!

Fill out the profile questions and place a picture of yourselves to get approved into the group. (A profile picture of yourself with face showing is required) When RSVPing to events, a "Yes" response indicates that you will be going and we take it seriously, so please don't RSVP "Yes" if you aren't sure.  Most importantly:

!!! NOT A SWINGERS GROUP!! NOT A SWINGERS GROUP!! NOT A SWINGERS GROUP!! NOT A SWINGERS GROUP!!!

name: Urban Bubbleball Meetup
description: Bubbleball soccer matches at a indoor/outdoor gym!! Come have a blast!!

name: Houston Spark Meetup
description: This meet up for all Spark enthusiasts in Houston Metro Area. It's a great opportunity to meet experts from industry verticals and learn how they are leveraging Spark to solve their modern big data challenges. We will also have technical experts who'll help provide guidance and latest in Scalable Machine Learning and Predictive Analytics. All of that in a friendly and congenial environment!

name: Houston Natural Language Processing Meetup
description: This group is for anyone in the Houston area interested Natural Language Processing. Topics may include computational linguistics, machine learning, text analytics, data mining, information extraction, speech processing, sentiment analysis, etc. Note: this group has nothing to do with Neuro Linguistic Programming.

name: Just Business Cypress, Texas
description:
Radical Referrals is all about building community among independent business people and helping them create lifetime friendships with business-minded people who are dedicated to helping others with their products and services. We are proud to run a group with no gossip, no drama, and no competition, meanness or judgment. We want people to be encouraged and supported as they pursue their entrepreneurial dreams!

We have very easy membership guidelines and offer social/networking events and opportunities as well as bi-monthly referral meetings. I would love for you to join us and see if the group may be a good fit for you! There is no cost at all to visit the group. Please feel free to bring a friend, business partner, or fellow business owner who may also be able to benefit.

name: Women In Film -TV - Digital Media & Publishing
description:
Our goal is to build a positive networking atmosphere where seasoned professional business women can come together to share ideas, offer support, Ideas and create solid business alliances.

Learn Tips & Ideas for other women in  Women In Film -TV - Digital Media & Publishing

name: West Houston Urban 20's & 30's Hangouts & Sports
description: This group is for young and fun people who may not be from Houston looking to meet new friends, singles, and much more. This group is destined to be fun so only cool and fun people please join!!

name: Houston 25-35 Women Small group
description: Small group of ladies (less than 15) who want to meet new people & experience the fun of Houston

name: Houston Ukrainian Events
description:
This Meetup group was created to inform Houstonians and visitors about upcoming Ukrainian events (and volunteering opportunities) in Houston. Unfortunately, organizer will not be proceeding with this Meetup Group due to high cost. If you would like to receive email communications about upcoming Ukrainian events in Houston, register at www.uacch.net and athttp://www.pokrova.org/

Here's a list of Ukrainian community organizations in Houston, where you can find additional information by checking their websites and Facebook pages.

Ukrainian American Cultural Club of Houston 
Website: www.uacch.net 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/UACCHouston 

Pokrova Protection of the Mother of God Ukrainian Catholic Church 
Website: www.pokrova.org 
9102 Meadowshire, Houston, TX 77037 

“Ridna Shkola” Ukrainian School of Houston 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/RidnaShkolaHouston , 

Ukrainian National Women's League of America, Inc. Branch 118 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/UNWLAHouston

Thank you for your interest in Houston Ukrainian Events Meetup group!

name: Kx Community Houston Meetup
description: This group is for those interested in the kdb+ database and its programming language, q. The idea is to provide an environment for people to meet, chat and present various topics on kdb+ and its industry applications. Everybody from total newbies to q "Gods" are welcome!

name: The WW Club
description: Have you ever wanted to simply go for a drink, to a movie or listen to a live band and really didn't haven't anyone to do it with? well.... search no more!!!!! This group is designed for the "WOMAN AT HEART" and those who are open minded, full of life and simply enjoy having a good time. I'm not the typical organizer, I am open to ideas, suggestions, and recommendations after all... THIS IS OUR GROUP. I have experience in the organizer seat, so let's collaborate, uplift and enjoy!!!!

name: The West End Runners Club
description:
WELCOME TO WERC!

The 12th affiliate of the FFP Running Clubs organization! We run every Tues. night (rain or shine) 5:30pm-8:30pm MISSION:
West End Running Club is dedicated to making Houston a healthier and happier place to live by promoting a culture of fitness, fun, and philanthropy.

-Encouraging people of all fitness levels to make running a fun part of their daily lives

-Enabling people to meet new friends and socialize with other fitness-minded individuals

-Empower people to advance the health and well-being of our community by giving back
Company OverviewThe West End - A Public House - Houston, TX hosts a weekly run every Tuesday night from 5:30pm to 8:30pm.

We meet at The West End every Tuesday night, then run a 2, 3, 4 or 6 mile route and meet back at The West End for a bite to eat & beer. FREE to join!

name: Houston Data Science
description: Inspiring those who have a deep desire to learn theory and practice of data science through teachings, trainings, tutorials and discussions.

name: Microsoft Azure User Group - Houston
description:
This group is for anyone interested in a discussion with others local to the Houston area around any aspect of Microsoft Azure and it's rapidly-growing, surrounding (non-Microsoft) ecosystem. 

We try and meet each month or so and talk about some aspect of Azure that might be of interest to as many people as possible.Topics range across both all Azure services (http://azureplatform.azurewebsites.net/en-u...) and 3rd-Party solutions that are deployed upon it so there should be something for everyone. Interested professionals might include a wide range, from infrastructure-focused IT Pros to Developers and Solution, Application or Enterprise Architects, Security practitioners, "Big Data" Scientists, and of course business leaders up to C-suite executives wanting to understand the high-level value propositions of the various features that Public Cloud enables in order to properly guide their businesses to "The Cloud". We also discuss solutions that 3rd Party (i.e. non-Microsoft) software vendors build on top of Azure to fill in feature gaps (via the Azure Marketplace).

No matter your role, we encourage everyone to join us no matter the topic because Public Cloud is the leveler that, for example, means those from a Development background now need to understand more about automated infrastructure than they ever have before, and those with an IT infrastructure background need to understand more about DevOps or Containers than they ever have before. The amount and pace of change that Cloud Computing  is bringing about to those in business and Technology is simply unprecedented and this group is one way everyone in the Community can try and keep up with it all.

Each event will focus on just one Azure area or Service or 3rd Party (Marketplace) solution, and typically have a guest speaker, a high-level overview followed by technical demonstration(s), and a Q&A session so we can not only share stories but everyone can learn from each other's experiences.

We look forward to seeing you soon!

name: The Get Down, Houston Meetup
description:
The NEW driving force for Houston's professional scene:

THE. GET. DOWN. Entry is free alll night!! And 5pm-9pm Happy Hour specials [$5.00 You Call Its]

Spend your Friday's at the new and renovated Mosaic Lounge with like minded professionals and enjoy the sounds curated by DJ Debanair from 5PM-9PM and 97.9's DJ YoungStreetz

name: StartUp SEO
description:
If you are involved in a Startup, an entrepreneur wanting to explore new ventures, or perhaps even an investor looking for a cutting edge idea to take on as your next project, StartUp SEO is perfect for you. StartUp SEO is about facilitating an environment that stimulates inspiration while building community centered around collaboration. 

The mission of StartUp SEO is to facilitate an environment where entrepreneurs can educate one another through collaboration with their peers. StartUps who need to leverage SEO to achieve success will greatly benefit from this meetup group. Some of the benefits members will see from attending include:

• Network and Meet New People With Innovative Ideas

• Learn From One Another and Gain Inspiration

• Get Introduced to Potential Partners and/or Investors 

• Meet and Learn from Successful StartUp Owners Who Used Internet Marketing as their sole marketing      channel.


What does the SEO mean?

SEO is a key tactic that many StartUps have used to grow their business and become successful. While SEO is a part of the name, SEO will not be every topic of discussion. However, more than likely, SEO can easily tie into a majority of your StartUp strategies.

name: HOUDATS! - Louisiana Love with a Houston Flair
description: This is a group for Louisiana transplants who call Houston home, Texas natives with Louisiana roots or anyone who enjoys the "joie de vivre" lifestyle. Come hang out and meet other individuals who love the Saints, Cajun food, Bayou living, Second lines, Zydeco, Jazz music and good ole fashion Southern hospitality. All are welcome. Looking forward to exploring Houston and meeting some down-home folks. Laissez les bon ton rouler! (Let the good times roll)

name: Houston H Friends
description:
Welcome Houston H friends! There are a 437737 reasons to join us!

This Meetup group is primarily focused around communicating social events for people with Herpes aka HSV this group is intended to help keep people informed of upcoming events around the Houston Metropolitan Area. We also welcome those with HPV (some of us have both).

This site is dedicated to helping bring the herpes and HPV challenged residents of Houston closer together through improved communications, support, education and promotion of social gatherings. Our events are located all over Houston and the Woodlands, including Sugar Land, Clear Lake and Galveston. Members also drive in from College Station, Beaumont, Austin, Dallas-Fort Worth and San Antonio!

Friendship and support await you, join our group and socialize with some great new people!

We also have a secret Facebook Group, once you attend an event we can add you to that group.

Need to talk ? Message me here or email me at Luna_roma@hotmail.com

Visit http://www.houstonhelp.info/ for support meeting info

see ya soon

Brenda

Houston H Friends moderator

name: Houston Professionals Social Group 30s - 50s
description:
Houston is a treasure-trove of history, culture, art, food and people. This group is about exploring and discovering the city, as well as making friends, meeting people and having fun along the way!

This group is for singles, couples, new-in-towners or people who have been in the Houston area for a while and are simply looking for a new group to go out with.

Several times a month we will gather in a variety of venues to attend events such as: Miller Outdoor Theater productions, live music, performance art, outdoor activities; 5K runs, hiking, walking and kayaking, museum exhibits and tours, happy hours, house parties, cultural festivals, wine tasting and foodie events and more.

name: Meetups During The Day
description: This Meetup is for those who can't regularly make later meetup activities (due to work, kids, school, etc.), but would still like to meet new people and/or do something social. Meetups can include brunch, lunch, movies, coffee, etc. and most will be between 10am - 2pm during the weekday, but activities at other times and weekends can be planned.

name: Houston Data Geeks
description: Open to all Houstonians interested in Big Data, Data Science, Machine Learning, Analytics, Hadoop, Spark, Cassandra, MongoDB, Data Mining, NoSQL, ... you get the picture.

name: Houston Smash4
description:
Welcome to the Official Houston Smash4 Group on Meetup. We are the largest Facebook group in Texas dedicated to Smash4. We strive to maintain the best place in Texas to play Smash4. In this group you will find many Smash enthusiasts, players, events, and tournaments. If you were looking to get involved with Smash4 in Houston you found the right place.

Facebook Page
https://www.facebook.com/HoustonSmash4/

Facebook Group
https://www.facebook.com/groups/HoustonSmashbros4/

As a member of this group we expect you to follow all the rules and policies located in the files section of the Facebook group page.
If you have any questions reach out to any of the admin.

name: Machine Learning Study Group @ Houston
description:
A home for data scientists and machine learning enthusiasts;
Read latest machine learning papers together, catching the trend of AI and discuss one or two papers at meetup;
Building something intelligent together, open to all cool ideas;
Share your experience and story with others.

name: Houston Artificial Intelligence Meetup
description: This group is for anyone interested in Artificial Intelligence and its fields. No specific requirements! Everyone is welcome!

name: Houston Concerts & Live Music
description: We love live music. Houston has some really amazing "hidden gems" and is also beginning to draw the bigger names. Our goal is to find those hidden gems, see those big names and hopefully makes some friends along the way.

name: Podcast Houston
description:
Calling all Podcasters and wannabe Podcasters in the Houston area! 

Let's get together to share our experience and Podcasting stories. 

Podcasting is the easiest, fastest, and most cost-effective way in history to build your brand, tell your story, and engage your community - or just have a little fun. 

Whether you're already a podcaster, thinking about starting a podcast, or in the middle of launching your very first podcast - Podcast Houston is the group for you - Join Us in the Galleria for fun, food, and fellowship.

name: Chinese speakers in Houston
description:
Hello Chinese speaking friends in Houston! Do you find it difficult to meet other Chinese speakers in Houston? Would you like to meet some new friends outside of school or work? Let's practice our Chinese (Mandarin or Cantonese) and make some new friends. Our goal is to organize both social and/or educational events somewhere around once a week. We'll meet weekends or after hours from work. Let's network, have fun, laugh, and enrich each others lives!

 

We don't have any kind of membership dues, though if you have fun at the activities, please feel free to chip in a dollar here or there to help go towards the cost of the site. =)

name: iNova45      A Create Tank
description: Innovators, Creators, Geniuses. This is not your mothers meetup. We are a serious group of creators/innovators fleshing out projects in real life/time. Serious, dedicated adventurers only need apply.

name: ACM Houston
description: ACM Houston is a non-profit professional group that meets regularly to discuss diverse topics in computer science such as user experience, user research, data visualization, predictive analytics, applied machine learning, statistical modeling, open data, and artificial neural networks. Meeting topics are varied and range from tutorials on basic concepts and their applications, to success stories from local practitioners and academic students, to discussions of tools, new technologies, and best practices. All are welcome to attend, to meet others, and to present their work. ACM Houston is powered by the ACM NAU Student Chapter and ACM Local at Association for Computing Machinery, Inc.

name: Friday Night Lights Texas High School Football
description: Texas High School Football Fans this is for you! Each week our members will select the week's best match up in the greater Houston area by Wednesday. Game night we'll meet, have a bite and watch a Texas tradition.

name: Pop-up Bike & Brunch Tour
description: If you would like to enjoy a Bike Tour starting in the heart of 3rd ward, through the museum district and more followed by a nice brunch at Biskit Junkie hot new restaurant located at 403 Westheimer.

name: Houston On Lunch ~ Downtown
description:
Our social group is for people who wish to share a dining experience in the Downtown area. We will enjoy a weekday luncheon or lunch-related activity once or twice a month. Members are encouraged to suggest restaurants or other venues for the group.

Every event will have specific details. Event updates will provide all necessary information such as the meet and greet location.

Please contact the Organizer with any questions.

name: The Houston Machine Learning Group
description: One day, we will be able to create the mind. This meet-up is about everything that comes along the way. If you love Machine Learning at technical, business or philosophical level, then you will enjoy this group and the meet-ups.

name: Deer Park Professionals
description: Professionals who live and work in around Deer Park, TX. This is initially being set up to see how much interest there would be for those who live and esp work in the area and can attend short meetups possibly after work before heading home on weekday evenings, and can be expanded as we see fit to include community service events.

name: Houston NICU Family Meetup Group
description:
Welcome to the Preemie Prints Houston chapter meetup group to offer support by connecting past & present NICU families. The NICU experience does not compare to anything else. It's one of those life changing events that no one truly understands unless they too have experienced it. You will undoubtably face a roller coaster of emotions and both physical and mental fatigue. We hope our variety of programs will share hope with many NICU families traveling this difficult road!

Preemie Prints offers individual support, NICU H.O.P.E. Meetings (face to face group support) handmade gift items, complimentary NICU and NICU graduate (up to 1 year) photography, a very active inspirational and informational facebook page, multiple private online NICU support groups, an online prayer wall, and a website/blog full of inspiring stories and information. Our combination of programs is very unique and a way to support and connect NICU, preemie, and angel families. Please visit the website to learn more:

Website/Blog - www.preemieprints.orgOrganization Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/PreemiePrintsPrivate FB Group for Houston NICU parents - https://www.facebook.com/groups/151350311701628/Houston Chapter Leader - Jeanna@preemieprints.org


We hope to meet you at an upcoming NICU H.O.P.E. meeting, sewing meeting, or event!

name: Houston Events Meetup
description: Have you ever wondered what kind of events are going on in the Houston area? Well we hope to be the home of all of the happenings and goings on in the Houston area. If you have an event or know an event going on please let us know about it so we can post. We want to get more people connected in Houston and let every know all the great things that this city has to offer.

name: Houston Business Intelligence Professionals
description: This is a local Houston community to share knowledge, experiences and best practices in Business Intelligence in general, not restricted to any platform or tool. Monthly meetings. All skills are welcome.

name: Christian Synergy
description:
This group was created to serve as an avenue for Christian friendships, Mentorships or partnerships to develop rather they be individual or corporate doesn't matter one bit. This group is for any one who shares in the common goal which is kingdom building .

Our motto : The people matter most.

 we have three types of meet ups 

1 men only

2 women only 

3 Men and Women together.

Things we do : Fellowship, Mentor, Volunteer, Bible studies, Financial Peace University, Men of Valor Seminar, Host Events, Talk Show Hosting, Lady Talk, Discussion Panels, Youth Advocacy, Spiritual Development training, Business building, Business Networking, Employment Assistance, Retreats, Travel, Prayer Parties, Praise Concerts, Arts and Craft, Coupon Classes, Christian Comedy and Poetry, Story Telling, Movie Nights, Healthy Living, Cycling, BBQ Picnics, Luncheons and etc.......


We have a open invitation to Pastors, First Ladies, Christians and  other christian meet ups too, however there are 7 things that we do not invite .

PROVERB 6:16-19 six things the Lord hates and the seventh is an abomination . 

Pride and Arrogance.               Eyes that show pride,

Liars.                                           Tongues that tell lies,
Murderers.                                 Hands that kill innocent people

Selfish Ambition.                      Hearts that plan evil things to do. 

Evil Busy Bodies.                       Feet that run to do evil 

False Testifiers                           Witnesses in court who tell lies,

DISCORD                           Anyone who causes family members to fight. Spiritual or Physical Family 


These 7 hurt people and our mission is to unite and build people thus these will not be tolerated.

VISIT SITE

name: Movie Theatre Showings of Re-Released Films (Age: 20s-30s)
description:
Like many film fans I like watching cult classics, especially on the big screen.

Movie theatres throughout the Houston-area frequently provide opportunities to see big screen presentations of both classic and cult-classic films (such as Pulp Fiction, Star Wars, the Big Lebowski, etc.). I have attended showings for many of the films listed below. I also plan to check out more screenings in the weeks and months to come, and so should you! I created this group with the hope that us young film fans could meet, greet, and connect through watching great films on the big screen.

These theatrical viewings include the following, among many others: 2001: A Space Odyssey, Ghostbusters, The Godfather (Parts 1& II), The Crow, Lawrence of Arabia, Pulp Fiction, The Shining, Akira, Notorious, Beetlejuice, Clockwork Orange, Bladerunner, Robocop, Eraserhead, Psycho, Alien, Halloween, The Big Lebowski, On the Waterfront, Terminator (1 & 2), Blue Velvet, Fight Club, Star Wars (the original trilogy), North by Northwest, The Thing, Seven Samurai, Citizen Kane, the list goes on…

In addition to seeing re-released classics, group events will also include screenings of smaller/independent films as well as blockbusters. (I love all film!) I will be posting events for film screenings, and I encourage others to do so as well. I’m excited about the connections that we can make through this group, and I look forward to meeting you!

Some minor housekeeping rules:

- Posting Events - Feel free to post events for film showings that interest you. But please make sure you only post about film screenings. (Exceptions of course include meetup spots, such as bars and restaurants, prior to a show.) When you post about an upcoming screening, please do the following: <br> 1.) List the name of the film, show time, theatre, address, and a convenient internet url address for others to conveniently purchase tickets. <br> 2.) Please include a convenient meetup spot so people know where to rendezvous – just to avoid confusion. (It might be fun to meet for coffee and/or drinks prior a screening.) <br> 3.) If you purchase a ticket for an event that includes reserved seating, please list your row and seat number on the page’s message board so others can easily book seats close to you. Also, be sure to check the online board to see where others are sitting. (There’s of course no requirement for everyone to sit with the group.)

- I adhere the to the Alamo Drafthouse Cinema’s “No Texting, Talking, Cell Phone Policy” which you can read at the link below: <br>https://drafthouse.com/houston/theater/village/admission <br>We want to be courteous other film-goers. People who have issues with talking, texting, excessive and loud whispering, as well as excessive and obnoxious laughter will be removed from the group.

- As the name of this meetup indicates this is a young adults’ group. Please only attend if you’re under 40. I don’t have issues with people 40+. I’m just trying to keep a young adult vibe.

If this all sounds exciting, please sign up to attend a film screening! Don’t be shy – we’d love to get to know you!

name: Christian Social Club
description:
CHRISTIAN SOCIAL CLUB (CSC) is a fun and casual platform where Christians can meet one another. We will host social events like dinner, movie, concert, bowling, game night, guys/girls night out, and really explore what Houston and the surrounding areas has to offer! But in addition to entertainment, we will also host volunteer/charity events. We believe that, by being together, we can encourage and inspire one another to live faithfully in His way (Hebrews 10:24-25).

All are welcome, even non-believers who are interested in exploring the belief! This club is not an initiative of any particular Church, but rather we are individuals of different background who are all committed to Christ (we actually met through Meetup.com!).

WHY DOES CSC EXIST?
Aside from Church on the weekends or occasional Bible studies, many Christians can find themselves alone against the wickedness of this world for most days of the week. Though there are over 2 billion Christians today, the many walking amongst us in our daily lives are merely self-proclaimed (Matthew 7:21-23). Nowadays it's easier to get lost and drift astray than to fully commit in the Way. This club exist to help fill the void especially for those not having fellow devoted Christians around in a more "normal" or "regular" setting (i.e. outside of Church), and to provide fun social outing options that preserve Holy living.

MISSION:
(1.) To connect devoted Christians with one another so that all can be inspired to live a righteous lifestyle and serve God regularly in accordance to the Scripture.
(2.) To help the "lone" believer(s) realize the strength and importance of the "Body" of Christ.
(3.) To provide a safe and supportive environment to discuss the Truth.

VISION:
To take part in building up as many believers as possible so that they can become the "light of the world" spreading joy, peace, love and Truth throughout. In turn, the ultimate hope is that all others will see the light and believe that Jesus is the Way.

WE'RE ALWAYS SEEKING VOLUNTEER ORGANIZERS!: 
We know that our vision is BIG, but it is something we believe so highly in! We will definitely need help in reaching our goals. If you are interested in volunteering to set up event(s), let us (organizers) know! We would also LOVE to collaborate with other Meetups!

>>>>>For BIBLE STUDY, check out our sister club: "Bible & Bites".<<<<<

name: Richmond/Sugarland/Katy Friends
description:
The Richmond/Sugarland/Katy community of Houston is such a diverse community that is rapidly expanding all its borders. This group will focus on bridging the community with fun, family, and genuine friendships. We will support community initiatives, professionally network, and just have some plain ole down time fun.
Our activities will include community walks, happy hours, mom's night out, movies, dinners, bowling, dancing, and even some travel to explore our great state and surroundings.

name: Innovators Crew (Thinking Outside the Box...).
description:
Innovators Crew was created to support creative innovative thinking among a network of professionals, entrepreneurs and investors such as to informally exchange information and knowledge, educate each other and benefit from the power of the group with respect to innovation and creative thinking as well as innovative entrepreneurship hopefully, working towards the creation of a national focal point for everything about innovation in Israel.

Our hope is to build a network of professionals, startups and companies as well as investors who meet up occasionally and communicate about innovation in the industrial and business world. In this respect we greatly encourage people and companies from all industrial sectors and businesses and not necessarily limit the scope to high technology. Since our group is organized around this specific vertical, please do not apply if you are a service provider for companies, as we may not accept your application.

Our Vision: Developing and Nurturing an"Innovation Nation"

name: OpenCoffee and Office Hours - Async Ventures
description: Houston's OpenCoffee Club is focused on building a community of entrepreneurs, investors, and techies interested in supporting our local businesses and economy. Our monthly events are informal meet-ups to network and connect while discussing the constantly changing Houston landscape. OpenCoffee also hosts the open office hours for Async Ventures(http://async.ventures). Async Ventures is a sweat venture group dedicated to jumping into the middle of Houston Startups and helping them grow by providing Technology, Staffing, and Fund Raising support.

name: Network & Social - Houston Networking Events
description: At their core, our events allow like-minded professionals to recognize, create, or act upon new relationships and networking opportunities. Our events offer low pressure interactions, while allowing professionals to market themselves or their company in a completely relaxed and social environment.  Reaching over 100,000 business professionals and collegiate entrepreneurs from over 35 Industries, Network and Social hosts monthly networking events and charitable fundraisers which allow individuals to grow their professional network in their city.  Network and Social has hosted over 100 events, and connected thousands of professional and entrepreneurs throughout the country. We guarantee our events will give you access to great new contacts with career aspirations similar to yours.  Register for an upcoming event to experience our unique approach to networking as you make long lasting connections in your city.

name: Houston Data Management Association
description:
Our Group is primarily the "Houston Chapter of DAMA International"  (dama.org);  Anyone interested in Data management is invited to join our group and attend our meetups.   However, we do accept annual dues using the PayPal link below.

Note: The current PayPal link displays ‘donation’ instead of ‘Membership dues’.

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=CAUPF4EUVJ3UQ

name: Future of Data Houston
description: This meetup is focused on the Future of Data and the open community data projects governed by the Apache Software Foundation. Geared towards developers, data scientists and ALL Data enthusiasts who are building modern data applications. Our meetups cover all data -- data-in-motion and data-at-rest. Meetups provide an opportunity to listen, share and work hands on with other technologists in the open source and open community Apache tools.

name: Big Data Developers in Houston
description:
This is an IBM sponsored Big Data Meetup group. Geared towards developers, data scientists and ALL Big Data enthusiasts, our Meetups provide an opportunity to work hands on with the solutions and tools in our Big Data portfolio.

Our Meetups typically include a 45-60 min (max) presentation that serves as an introduction and overview for a specific Big Data technology.  It is followed by ~3 hours to collaborate with fellow developers and apply your Big Data skills.  Depending upon the location, we can provide a cloud environment that you can run through the browser of your laptop at NO cost to you. Our meetups are FREE.


Meetp topics include:
- Hadoop-based analytics
- Open Source Hadoop, SQL on Hadoop, R on Hadoop, Integration, Governance, ...
- Real Time Analytics & Stream Computing
- Text Analytics
- Visualization and Discovery tools for Big Data
- Big Data App Development
- Big Data & Cloud
- NoSQL
- Internet of Things (IoT)
- Deep dives into the technologies that makes big data processing possible
- Anything and everything about Big Data

Join us today for a hands on software development experience.

name: Houston Energy Data Science Meetup
description: This Group is for practitioners, enthusiasts, novice, and curious members in the field of Energy Data Science. The Energy industry has its own set of jargon,laws, taxes,etc., so it important that any Data Scientist network with other Data Scientists to share Subject Matter Expertise. This group is designed for this purpose.

name: Open Architecture Houston
description:
Welcome to Open Architecture Houston! We are a chapter of the Open Architecture Collaborative, formerly Architecture for Humanity. 

We are local designers working with underserved communities, contributing resources to a global network. If you are a design/construction professional, a student, or are just interested in how design can have a positive impact in our community, join us!

When people design and build their own environments, they take ownership of the places they create, sustain them long term, keep them safe, invest in them, and color them with their most precious expressions. We bring together architects, designers, nonprofit organizations, municipalities and local community groups, enabling underserved communities to take ownership of collectively created places.

We address two problems: lack of hands-on community experience for young professionals and limited access to design services for marginalized communities.


Open Architecture Houston seeks to facilitate the inclusive creation of place and space through open, participatory design principles. We are working towards building a more sustainable future where all members of our Houston community can thrive.

name: Houston Google Local Guides
description: If you love to explore our beautiful city from Katy to Galveston (you know we're all considered greater Houston Area) while sharing your adventures with the community through pictures, reviews, and ratings, you've found the perfect group! Every month, Google Local Guides gives amazing rewards for winners of different challenges that involve contributing to Google Maps. I want our group to be front and center - putting places on the map, making notable changes, taking snapshots of our beautiful city, and aligning stars with great businesses and attractions! Ultimately, we'll be creating a positive change for our community and visitors and putting ourselves "on the map!" Literally. Join in on the fun from the comfort of your own couch, or come out to our social gatherings; the choice is yours!

name: Analytics.Club Houston
description:
Analytics.CLUB is world’s largest volunteer led data analytics community. We are all motivated and tasked to create a friendly, information sharing community for local talent pool. We also support our strong offline community with online tools to improve engagement and create deep networks so we all could learn from each other. Professionals (from Fortune 100 Chief Analytics Officers to Leading Business Analysts), join #AnalyticsCLUB to help build a strong and vibrant data analytics community. You are welcome too!

Here are some useful links:

AnalyticsCLUB Online: https://analytics.club

Artificial Intelligence Career Coach TAO: https://tao.ai

Community Guidelines:

Analytics.CLUB Meetup follows Meetup.com's Use of Platform guidelines, as well as our own Community Guidelines. We expect all members to respect each other acknowledge these at all times. Should you have any concern, please contact us at info@Analytics.CLUB Thank you.

About our community:

Founded in 2013, Analytics.CLUB is the largest and fastest growing data analytics club in the world. Designed by data scientists for data analytics professionals, our community supports and empowers STEM networks, brings analytics to the 99%, and offers educational and career opportunities. Our members join online and offline meetups to promote brand/mission awareness, share resources, and hire talent. 


https://youtu.be/-LP636bbszA

Want to find/post jobs? Email: http://jobs.analyticsweek.com

Want to support/speak/sponsor? Email us: info@analyticsweek.com

Questions or suggestions? We are happy to help! Contact us: info@analyticsweek.com

name: TIBCO Houston User Group
description: TIBCO Software empowers executives, developers, and business users with Fast Data solutions that make the right data available in real time for faster answers, better decisions, and smarter action. Over the past 15 years, thousands of businesses across the globe have relied on TIBCO technology to integrate their applications and ecosystems, analyze their data, and create real-time solutions. Learn how TIBCO turns data—big or small—into differentiation at www.tibco.com.
